extension.description:
Pre-requisite - Google Authentication Mobile app, Barcode scanner.
How to configure it :
  1. STEP-1# Enable Plugin.(Status Enable->Save)
  2. STEP-2# In Configure tab you can set it for "Frontend, Backend or Both for specific users."
  3. STEP-3# Setup an account in Googe Authentication Mobile app.
  4. STEP-4# To setup - Scan QR code/Enter Key in Google Authentication Mobile app
  5. STEP-5# Set Activate to Yes
  6. STEP-6# Now, Enable Two Factor Authentication under required user in User screen.
NOTE - After configurating Two-Way Authenticator make sure that you have scanned QR code or enter key provided in your google authentication app. Otherwise After activation, you can use backup utility code or to deactivate you need to disable it from database.
